tool_description: Get the latest moving averages for any cryptocurrency with the Moving Averages API.
name: Crypto Moving Averages API
title: Crypto Moving Averages API

api_list.name: Cryptocurrency MA price point on chosen timeframe
api_list.description: Displays crypto currency moving avarage price point on chosen timeframe
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-moving-averages-api.p.rapidapi.com/BTCUSDT/15m/25"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-moving-averages-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-moving-averages-api.p.rapidapi.com/{cryptocurrency}/{timeframe}/{ma}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-moving-averages-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
